meanings.definition: The act of setting up a camp or staying in a camp.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, our family enjoys campings in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Last weekend, we went on campings near the lake.
meanings.sent3: The bear decided to join our campings for a night of stargazing.
meanings.sent4: Her love for campings is like a warm fire on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pine trees always reminds me of our campings.

meanings.definition: The activity of spending time outdoors in a tent or camper.
meanings.sent1: Campings under the stars are magical experiences for children.
meanings.sent2: We packed our bags for a weekend of campings in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon stole our snacks during our campings, cheeky little fellow.
meanings.sent4: In her camper, she found solace in the simplicity of campings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crickets filled the air during our peaceful campings.

meanings.definition: The practice of camping as a recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: Their company organizes group campings every summer for team building.
meanings.sent2: I bought new gear for our upcoming campings by the river.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel challenged us to a race during our campings, quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of stress, campings are my escape to tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The laughter around the campfire echoed through our memorable campings.
